notes: feminine noun; means route or course; also 'essere in rotta con' = be at odds

example_sentence_italian: Rotte antiche sono visibili sulle mappe.
example_sentence_english: Ancient routes are visible on the maps.
The schedule of the route has changed.
The ship is on the route.
The boat is on the route.
I refer to the ancient routes.
The information comes from the routes.
I do not get lost in the routes.
We have data on the routes.
